items.title: Markets extend gains on IT surge; Infosys share buyback buzz lifts sentiment
items.description: Investor focus now shifts to key U.S. inflation prints, with producer price data due Wednesday and consumer price data on Thursday.

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty closes above 24,850, Sensex gains 314 pts; IT stocks shine
items.description: More than 130 stocks touched their 52-week highs on the BSE, including Cummins India, Maharashtra Scooters, Eicher Motors, Muthoot Finance, Aditya Birla Capital, Maruti Suzuki, Bosch, M&M, Endurance Technnologies, Manappuram Finance, among others.

items.title: Trent, Eternal, other consumer-facing stocks fall up to 2% on profit booking after GST 2.0
items.description: The Nifty Consumer Durables index fell 0.12 percent to end the session at 39,639.30, standing in the red for the third consecutive session.

items.title: Live: IT stocks drive Nifty above 24,850 on weekly expiry day | Closing Bell | 4K
items.description:
Nifty Extends Winning Streak To 5th Day. Sensex Surges 350 Pts; India Vix Eases. Broader Indices Extend Gains To 2nd Day. Nifty IT Snaps 5-day Losing Streak; Up 3(%)
Nifty Auto Breaks 4-day Gaining Streak. Nifty 50 Gainers: Infosys, Wipro, Dr Reddy's. Nifty 50 Losers: Eternal, Trent, Jio Financial. Nifty 500 Leaders: Gfcl, Intellect Design, Ace. Nifty 500 Laggards: Jaiprakash Power, Gmdc, Balrampur Chini. Catch Lovisha Darad and Yatin Mota as they discuss the stocks on their radar.

items.title: Sunteck Realty shares see profit-booking after 16% rise in two sessions; here's what Jefferies says
items.description: Jefferies has maintained a 'Buy' rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 575, noting that it trades at over 35 percent discount to net asset value, thereby limiting downside risks.

items.title: 3M India shares trade flat amid volume surge; stock part of Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: Shares of 3M India were trading flat in Tuesday's session, with the stock currently priced at Rs 30,860.

items.title: JSW Infrastructure shares surge 3.98% amid high volume in today's session
items.description: The surge in JSW Infrastructure shares reflects strong investor activity and notable financial performance, marking a positive trend in Tuesday's trading session.

items.title: UNO Minda shares fall 2.11% amid price decline
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 1,282.30, UNO Minda has experienced a decline of 2.11% today and is part of the Nifty Midcap 150 index.

items.title: Vodafone Idea shares rise 2.47% in today's session
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 7.47, Vodafone Idea has seen a rise of 2.47% from its previous close.

items.title: Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company shares rise 2.04%, among top gainers on Nifty Next 50
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 1,524.50, Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company has shown a positive trend today and has demonstrated substantial financial growth in recent years, positioning it as a noteworthy player in the financial services sector.

items.title: Gujarat Fluoro shares surge 6.99%; among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 3,604.00, Gujarat Fluoro has emerged as one of the top gainers on the Nifty Midcap 150 index.

items.title: Subscribe for Urban Company Ltd IPO; Anand Rathi
items.description: Anand Rathi, has come out with its report on Urban Company Ltd. The research firm has recommended to “ Subscribe” the ipo in its research report as on September 09, 2025.

items.title: Larsen & Toubro shares trade flat; stock touches day's high of Rs 3,550
items.description: Moneycontrol analysis, as of September 02, 2025, indicates a bearish sentiment on the stock.

items.title: Hindustan Unilever shares trade higher, touch day's low of Rs 2,611.30
items.description: Moneycontrol analysis indicates a bullish sentiment on Hindustan Unilever as of September 8, 2025.

items.title: Tata Communications shares rise 2.39% in today's trading
items.description: Tata Communications shares gained 2.39% to Rs 1,583.90 in Tuesday's session.

items.title: Syngene International shares fall 2.69% in today's session
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 632.00, Syngene International has seen a decline in today's session.

items.title: Gujarat Fluoro, JSW Infra among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: Gujarat Fluoro, JSW Infra, MphasiS, COFORGE LTD., and Glenmark emerged as the top gainers on the Nifty Midcap 150 index.

items.title: Eternal shares fall 1.21%; stock among top losers on Nifty 50
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 325.65, Eternal was identified as one of the top losers on the Nifty 50 index.

items.title: Infosys, Wipro, Dr Reddys Labs among top gainers on Nifty 50
items.description: The Nifty 50 index saw several stocks trading positively, with Infosys shares leading the gains.

items.title: Thermax shares rise 2.26% in Tuesday's trading session
items.description: Shares of Thermax were trading positively, reflecting a notable increase in investor confidence and market activity as of 12:16 pm.

items.title: Buy Ujjivan Small Finance Bank; target of Rs 60: Emkay Global Financial
items.description: Emkay Global Financial is bullish on Ujjivan Small Finance Bank has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 60 in its research report dated September 09, 2025.

items.title: Reduce Firstsource Solutions; target of Rs 350: Emkay Global Financial
items.description: Emkay Global Financial recommended reduce rating on Firstsource Solutions with a target price of Rs 350 in its research report dated September 08, 2025.

items.title: Larsen & Toubro shares trade flat; touches day's high of Rs 3,550
items.description: A Moneycontrol analysis as of September 2, 2025, indicated a bearish sentiment on the stock.

items.title: Aditya Birla Capital shares hit all-time high of Rs 293.25
items.description: With the stock currently trading near its all-time high, Aditya Birla Capital's financial performance reflects a mix of revenue growth and profitability.

items.title: Tata Consultancy Services shares rise 0.99% in morning trade
items.description: Tata Consultancy Services' stock was trading at Rs 3,048.90, a 0.99% increase from the previous close as of 11:40 am.

items.title: Promoter offloads 7.8% stake in Voltamp Transformers for Rs 600 crore
items.description: Voltamp Transformers share price dropped 3.53 percent to Rs 7,503, the lowest closing level since May 9 this year, on the NSE and closed below the lower line of Bollinger bands, extending downtrend for fourth consecutive session.
